channel.title: Artist, athlete, & entrepreneur chasing sunshine & h2o
channel.description: Artist, athlete, & entrepreneur chasing sunshine & h2o

item.title: God doesn’t play favorites in sports
item.description:
God doesn’t play favorites in sports

Take responsibility for yourself and and your own game, and play with Love and passion

item.title: Rain from a blue sky – coincidence or the Universe saying thank you?
item.description:
Rain from a blue sky – coincidence or the Universe saying thank you?

It was either coincidence or some kind of universal statement of gratitude. Everything is energy, and everything is connected…so I’ll go with the latter.

item.title: Who is Josh Galt?
item.description:
Who is Josh Galt?

My name is Josh Galt. I'm an artist, an athlete, and an entrepreneur, and I'm quite fond of chasing sunshine & h2o around the planet.
